alert.note: Alert for McLennan (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 25 at 1:28AM CDT until September 25 at 2:30AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central McLennan County in central Texas... * Until 230 AM CDT. * At 127 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near McGregor, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Waco, Hewitt, Robinson, Bellmead, Woodway, McGregor, Mart, Beverly Hills, Lorena, Riesel, Crawford, Golinda, Hallsburg, Lake Waco, Tradinghouse Creek Reservoir, Lake Creek Lake, Willow Grove, Asa, Spring Valley, and Downsville. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 321 and 337. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure and stay away from windows.
